languages.text: "Я принимаю смерть за верность истинному Лекс Империалис, и делаю это без сожалений. Единственное, о чем я попрошу — позаботьтесь о Глейто". {n}Соломон закрывает глаза и громко произносит:{/n} "Протокол Отказ — покинуть ДК-1. Прощай... друг".
languages.translation_comment:
Стартует этюд VP_SolomonTraitorDead
После куя в Соломона стреляет пушка

Стартует этюд VP_SolomonTraitorDead
После куя в Соломона стреляет пушка

languages.text: "I accept death for staying loyal to the true Lex Imperialis, and I do so without regrets. My only request is this: take care of Glaito." {n}Solomorne closes his eyes and shouts a command:{/n} "Rejection protocol: leave DX-1. Farewell... my friend."
languages.original_text: "Я принимаю смерть за верность истинному Лекс Империалис, и делаю это без сожалений. Единственное, о чем я попрошу — позаботьтесь о Глейто". {n}Соломон закрывает глаза и громко произносит:{/n} "Протокол Отказ — покинуть ДК-1. Прощай... друг".

traits.locale_text: "I accept death for keeping loyalty to the true Lex Imperialis, and I do so without regrets. My only request is this: take care of Glaito." {n}Solomorne closes his eyes and shouts a command:{/n} "Rejection protocol: leave DX-1. Farewell... my friend."

"I accept death for keeping loyalty to the true Lex Imperialis, and I do so without regrets. My only request is this: take care of Glaito." {n}Solomorne closes his eyes and shouts a command:{/n} "Rejection protocol: leave DX-1. Farewell... my friend."

"I accept death for staying loyal to the true Lex Imperialis, and I do so without regrets. My only request is this: take care of Glaito." {n}Solomorne closes his eyes and shouts a command:{/n} "Rejection protocol: leave DX-1. Farewell... my friend."

"I accept death for staying loyal to the true Lex Imperialis, and I do so without regrets. My only request is this: take care of Glaito." {n}Solomorne closes his eyes and shouts a command:{/n} "Rejection protocol: leave DX-1. Farewell... my friend."

"I accept death for staying loyal to the true Lex Imperialis, and I do so without regrets. My only request is this: take care of Glaito." {n}Solomorne closes his eyes and shouts a command:{/n} "Rejection protocol: leave DX-1. Farewell... my friend."

"I accept death for staying loyal to the true Lex Imperialis, and I do so without regrets. My only request is this: take care of Glaito." {n}Solomorne closes his eyes and shouts a command:{/n} "Rejection protocol: leave DX-1. Farewell... my friend."

languages.text: "Ich akzeptieren den Tod für meine Treue zum wahren Lex Imperia und bereue nichts. Ich habe nur eine Bitte: Kümmert Euch um Glaito." {n}Solomorne schließt die Augen und erteilt einen Befehl:{/n} "Ausmusterungsprotokoll: Verlasse DX-1. Leb wohl ... mein Freund."
languages.original_text: "I accept death for staying loyal to the true Lex Imperialis, and I do so without regrets. My only request is this: take care of Glaito." {n}Solomorne closes his eyes and shouts a command:{/n} "Rejection protocol: leave DX-1. Farewell... my friend."

traits.locale_text: "Ich akzeptieren den Tod für meine Treue zum wahren Lex Imperia und bereue nichts. Ich habe nur eine Bitte: Kümmert Euch um Glaito." {n}Solomorne schließt die Augen und erteilt einen Befehl:{/n} "Ausmusterungsprotokoll: Verlasse DX-1. Leb wohl ... mein Freund."

languages.text: « J'accepte sans regret de mourir pour être resté loyal à la véritable Lex Imperialis. Je ne vous demande qu'une chose : prenez soin de Glaito. » {n}Solomorne ferme les yeux et donne un ordre :{/n} « Protocole de rejet : quitter DX-1. Adieu... mon ami. »
languages.original_text: "I accept death for staying loyal to the true Lex Imperialis, and I do so without regrets. My only request is this: take care of Glaito." {n}Solomorne closes his eyes and shouts a command:{/n} "Rejection protocol: leave DX-1. Farewell... my friend."

traits.locale_text: « J'accepte sans regret de mourir pour être resté loyal à la véritable Lex Imperialis. Je ne vous demande qu'une chose : prenez soin de Glaito. » {n}Solomorne ferme les yeux et donne un ordre :{/n} « Protocole de rejet : quitter DX-1. Adieu... mon ami. »

languages.text: “我忠于真正的帝国法典。我愿意接受死亡，我心里也没有任何遗憾。我唯一的请求是——照顾好格雷托。”{n}索罗蒙闭上眼睛，大声喊出了命令。{/n}“否决协议：离开DX-1。永别了……我的朋友。”
languages.original_text: "I accept death for staying loyal to the true Lex Imperialis, and I do so without regrets. My only request is this: take care of Glaito." {n}Solomorne closes his eyes and shouts a command:{/n} "Rejection protocol: leave DX-1. Farewell... my friend."

traits.locale_text: “我忠于真正的帝国法典。我愿意接受死亡，我心里也没有任何遗憾。我唯一的请求是——照顾好格雷托。”{n}索罗蒙闭上眼睛，大声喊出了命令。{/n}“否决协议：离开DX-1。永别了……我的朋友。”

languages.text: «Acepto la muerte por ser fiel a la verdadera Lex Imperialis, y lo hago sin remordimientos. Solo le pido que cuide de Glaito». {n}Solomorne cierra los ojos y proclama una orden:{/n} «Protocolo de rechazo: abandono DX-1. Adiós... amigo mío».
languages.original_text: "I accept death for staying loyal to the true Lex Imperialis, and I do so without regrets. My only request is this: take care of Glaito." {n}Solomorne closes his eyes and shouts a command:{/n} "Rejection protocol: leave DX-1. Farewell... my friend."

traits.locale_text: «Acepto la muerte por ser fiel a la verdadera Lex Imperialis, y lo hago sin remordimientos. Solo le pido que cuide de Glaito». {n}Solomorne cierra los ojos y proclama una orden:{/n} «Protocolo de rechazo: abandono DX-1. Adiós... amigo mío».

languages.text: 「真のレックス・インペリアに忠誠を尽くすために、死を受け入れます。後悔などありません。私の願いはただ一つ、グライトの世話を頼みます」{n}ソロモーンは目を閉じ、コマンドを叫ぶ。{/n}「拒絶プロトコル：DX-1から離脱せよ。さらばだ…友よ」
languages.original_text: "I accept death for staying loyal to the true Lex Imperialis, and I do so without regrets. My only request is this: take care of Glaito." {n}Solomorne closes his eyes and shouts a command:{/n} "Rejection protocol: leave DX-1. Farewell... my friend."

traits.locale_text: 「真のレックス・インペリアに忠誠を尽くすために、死を受け入れます。後悔などありません。私の願いはただ一つ、グライトの世話を頼みます」{n}ソロモーンは目を閉じ、コマンドを叫ぶ。{/n}「拒絶プロトコル：DX-1から離脱せよ。さらばだ…友よ」

languages.text: "Gerçek Lex İmperialis'e olan sadakatimden ötürü hiçbir pişmanlık hissetmeden ölümü kucaklıyorum. Sizden tek bir isteğim var: Glaito'ya iyi bakın." {n}Solomorne, gözlerini kapayıp bağırarak bir komut veriyor.{/n} "Ret Protokolü. DX-1'den ayrıl. Elveda… dostum."
languages.original_text: "I accept death for staying loyal to the true Lex Imperialis, and I do so without regrets. My only request is this: take care of Glaito." {n}Solomorne closes his eyes and shouts a command:{/n} "Rejection protocol: leave DX-1. Farewell... my friend."

traits.locale_text: "Gerçek Lex Imperialis'e olan sadakatimden ötürü hiçbir pişmanlık hissetmeden ölümü kucaklıyorum. Sizden tek bir isteğim var: Glaito'ya iyi bakın." {n}Solomorne gözlerini kapayıp bağırarak bir komut veriyor.{/n} "Ret Protokolü: DX-1'i terk et. Elveda… dostum."
